amendatorysection.catchline: Kratom product; person under twenty-one years of age; acts prohibited; age-verification system.
amendatorysection.para: (1) No person shall sell, offer for sale, provide, or distribute a kratom product to a person under twenty-one years of age.
(2) An online retailer or marketplace that sells or offers for sale a kratom product shall implement an age-verification system to ensure compliance with this section.
